name: "Benedict" by Claire Wilkinson
description:
BENEDICT by Claire Wilkinson

Cute adventure, side-scrolling cat game with a storyline. Unfinished art and scenes ^_^ 

Ideas produced by Claire Wilkinson.

Art and animations created by Claire Wilkinson.

Coding done by Claire Wilkinson with the help of Ryan Cowley and the internet.

Mouse Left Click to move left or right.
Mouse Right Click to interact.
